dcterms:description: A dataset for sentiment analysis of code-mixed tweets in Hindi and English, used in the SemEval-2020 Task 9 competition.
dcterms:title: Hindi-English code-mixed dataset

dcterms:description: A dataset for sentiment analysis that combines Spanish and English code-mixed data, mentioned in the context of enhancing training diversity.
dcterms:title: Spanish-English code-mixing dataset

dcterms:creator: Richard Socher
Alex Perelygin

dcterms:description: A sentiment analysis dataset that provides a treebank for recursive deep models, used for semantic compositionality.
dcterms:title: SST-2 (Stanford Sentiment Treebank)

dcterms:creator: Anindya Sarkar
Sujeeth Reddy
Raghu Sesha Iyengar
dcterms:description: A dataset for natural language inference that includes multiple genres, used for zero-shot multilingual sentiment analysis.
dcterms:title: MNLI (Multi-Genre Natural Language Inference)
